orig_text:
APPENDIX-I:  US DOMAIN NAMES BNF
                     ================================

   <us-domain-name>    ::= <us-name><dot><us>

   <us-name>           ::= <state-name><dot><state-code> |
                           <fed-name><dot><fed>
                           <dni-name><dot><dni>

   <state-code>        ::= <the two-letter code of a state from the
                            zip code directory>
correct_text:
APPENDIX-I:  US DOMAIN NAMES BNF
                     ================================

   <us-domain-name>    ::= <us-name><dot><us>

   <us-name>           ::= <state-name><dot><state-code> |
                           <fed-name><dot><fed> |
                           <dni-name><dot><dni>

   <state-code>        ::= <the two-letter code of a state from the
                            zip code directory>
notes:
Missing a pipe after <fed-name><dot><fed>

Now, I'm not super confident in my BNF syntax, but I'm 95% sure there should be a pipe there. Let me know.
